description: Aiptek’s PenCamHD is the World’s smallest HD camcorder. Roughly the size of a highlighter pen, you can slip it into your pocket and take it with you everywhere! The PenCamHD has a trio of functions, including a 720p High-Definition camcorder, a 5MP Digital Still Camera and an MP3 Player. With its integrated memory and built-in rechargeable battery, you can capture up to 2 hours of High-Definition footage! Sharing your memories with friends and family is simple too. You can plug the PenCamHD into a USB port on your PC or Mac and easily upload to sites like YouTube and Vimeo, or use the included HDMI cable to plug directly into your HDTV and playback right from the PenCam itself. No other High-Definition camcorder out there is as compact, convenient, or as simple to use as the new PenCamHD!
title: Aiptek PenCam Trio HD 4 GB Camcorder Value Pack (Red)
